sources.description:
Which One Is The Killer?
Shocked by the death of her spouse, a scheming widow hatches a bold plan to get her hands on the inheritance, unaware that she is targeted by an axe-wielding murderer who lurks in the family's estate. What mystery shrouds the noble house?

Original title: Dementia 13 (1963)

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/EvjYwBGgqj4

Director: Francis Ford Coppola
Writers: Francis Ford Coppola, Jack Hill
Stars: William Campbell, Luana Anders, Bart Patton, Mary Mitchel
Genres: Classics, Horror, Thriller
Budget: $40,000

A Gripping Horror Film Unveiling Tension, Guilt, and Sinister Secrets within a Dysfunctional Family
